data.message: The us government getting away with making the people and charities pay for shit again. They are the richest country in the world how can hey not afford to help everyone?

replies.message:
Because our gov't thinks its more important to spend $700 billion on the military. Yet we have Vets
 and children sleeping on the streets of America  going hungry everyday. Oh and tax cuts for the million and billionaires.
America is 3 trillion dollars in debt to china?
Americas government doesn't make money. The government taxes its citizens for its money. When the US gives money, it's the people's money.
And the people are too divided to stand together and change it. It's very sad.
You are not from the US..you get no comment

Wow you prove how bad the division is in that country. I can't comment because I'm not from there? I'm a human looking from outside in, wishing I didn't see as much oppression and corruption. 

Anyone can comment any time from anywhere. I'm not sure what your against but its typical your having a go at me. Sorry I didn't know your made up, separatist rules Kris Calvert Clark
